Name: Hex of Steel
About the game: Official Discord server : With a failed Kickstarter campaign and 53 euros in our pocket, my brother and I decided to get the game done even with all odds against us ! Why should you be getting HoS and not the other wargames out there ? I'm glad you asked ! Key features Adaptive AI that doesn't cheat Gigantic scenarios (Europe, North Africa, Pacific, Italy ...) No turn limit, no unit limit (unless you set one in the map editor or play with the manpower mechanics) Cross-platform (Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS, Android) Real time multiplayer and PBEM multiplayer Standard unit representation or NATO one at the push of a key! Capture almost any unit you'd like and use it in your army Branched campaigns with core units system (Keep certain units and their history throughout an entire campaign) Basic diplomacy Over 50 policies (Doctrines, occupation, conscription, infrastructures) to personalize your gameplay! Many editors in the base game (tile, unit, country, scenario) A random scenario generator (WIP) Dynamic weather SFX and GFX Public Steam leaderboard , compare how well you did with other Steam players! Many, many interesting and original mechanics and totally optional! Strict no DLCs policy here The game on iOS (4.3/5) : -citadel/id1532682161 The game on Android (4.7/5) : ;hl=en&gl=US
